scripts.install:all: concurrently "npm run install:web" "npm run install:client" && npm run install:recommender
scripts.start:dev:recommender: cd server/recommender && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.start:dev:all: npm run docker:web:start && wait-port localhost:5433 && npm run prisma:migrate && concurrently "npm run start:dev:web" "npm run start:dev:client" "npm run start:dev:recommender"
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd server/web && npx prisma migrate dev
